SummaryEnglish: The Avengers rescue a trio of children (Makoto, Adi, and Chloe) who were granted superhuman powers from a nefarious experiment by the evil organization, Hydra.

1.SummaryEnglish: Super-powered kids discover that they've been secretly training under Hydra to be villains and they break out to seek the help of the Avengers and bring down their evil overlords.

2.SummaryEnglish: While Thor, Captain America, Hulk and Wasp battle Red Skull, Iron Man and Makoto search Hydra's base to rescue Chloe and Adi.

3.SummaryEnglish: The Avengers are tasked with transporting Red Skull to the Raft. Along the way, they are attacked by the Winter Soldier, who seeks to eliminate Red Skull.

4.SummaryEnglish: Bored with hanging around Avengers Tower, Makoto, Chloe, and Adi sneak out and into New York City to try and become heroes on their own.

5.SummaryEnglish: Thor and the Future Avengers visit K'un-L'un, where Iron Fist offers to train the team in martial arts.

6.SummaryEnglish: Ezekiel Stane issues a challenge to Iron Man, seeking to avenge his father the Iron Monger.

7.SummaryEnglish: While the Future Avengers are house-sitting Avengers Tower, Deadpool breaks in to steal the plans for Iron Man's new armor.

8.SummaryEnglish: Bruno is revived and recruited by the Masters of Evil, who battle the Avengers when they come to retrieve him.

9.SummaryEnglish: With the Avengers presumed dead, Captain Marvel, Black Widow and Hawkeye must stop the Masters of Evil in their place.

10.SummaryEnglish: Iron Man travels to Wakanda to warn the Black Panther about a vibranium smuggling operation, unaware that Chloe has stowed away.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Green Goblin manipulates Hulk into going berserk, stoking anti-superhero sentiment and leading him to quit the Avengers.

12.SummaryEnglish: After the superhero regulation bill passes, the Green Goblin begins targeting the bill's opponents.

13.SummaryEnglish: The Green Goblin steals the Hulkbuster armor and goes on a rampage, forcing Spider-Man, Hulk, and the Future Avengers to work together and take him down.

14.SummaryEnglish: The Leader sabotages Iron Man's new booster system during a test flight. Makoto and Falcon are the only ones fast enough to catch up and save him, but Bruno interferes.

15.SummaryEnglish: The Future Avengers track down a young superheroine, Kamala Khan, who has been using her shapeshifting abilities to impersonate Captain Marvel.

16.SummaryEnglish: Captain America travels to Russia to free the Winter Soldier from Arnim Zola's captivity.

17.SummaryEnglish: Captain America teams up with the Winter Guard to take down a Hydra conspiracy within the Russian government.

18.SummaryEnglish: The Leader hires Deadpool to kidnap Makoto, and the Avengers must track them down before Makoto can be delivered to the Masters of Evil.

19.SummaryEnglish: The Avengers are charged with protecting a stockpile of vibranium weapons. Thor recruits Loki to assist them, but they are unsure if he can be trusted.

20.SummaryEnglish: While the Avengers face off against the Masters of Evil, who have harnessed the power of the Emerald Crystal, Makoto tries to convince Bruno to join their side.

21.SummaryEnglish: Kang the Conqueror arrives on Earth and initiates the final stages of the Emerald Rain Project. Captain Marvel and the Avengers battle the invader while the Future Avengers protect civilians.

22.SummaryEnglish: The Future Avengers and Bruno sneak aboard Kang's ship to shut down the Emerald Rain Project.

23.SummaryEnglish: Doctor Strange sends Makoto back in time to 6th century Camelot to retrieve the time-displaced Avengers

24.SummaryEnglish: Makoto and Bruno team up and use their powers to pierce the barrier surrounding Kang's ship.

25.SummaryEnglish: The Avengers and their allies launch their final assault against Kang.

26.SummaryEnglish: As Kang's ship falls to Earth, Iron Man races to prevent it from destroying the planet.

1.SummaryEnglish: Makoto's Visco AI begins rapidly evolving due to an infection from Kang's technology, causing it to rampage through the city.

2.SummaryEnglish: Chloe, Wasp, and Black Widow infiltrate a cruise liner to retrieve an Infinity Stone being sold at a black market auction.

3.SummaryEnglish: Adi and Hawkeye find and care for a stray cat encased in high-tech armor, discovering a plot by the Inventor to turn pets into weapons.

4.SummaryEnglish: While the team investigates a series of giant monster attacks occurring around the world, Makoto befriends young artist Kei Kawade.

5.SummaryEnglish: The Avengers and Kid Kaiju's monsters team up to take down an invading race of alien Kaiju.

6.SummaryEnglish: The Avengers begin looking into a strange mist responsible for giving Kamala and new supervillain Blizzard their powers.

7.SummaryEnglish: Chloe poses as a student to keep an eye on Kamala, while the Avengers deal with an influx of superhumans created by the mist.

8.SummaryEnglish: While the Avengers retrieve their teammates from A.I.M.'s captivity, the World Security Council attempts to detain all those afflicted by the mist, including Kamala.

9.SummaryEnglish: The Inhumans attempt to take those transformed by the mist back to Attilan, while the Avengers and the WSC debate how to handle the afflicted.

10.SummaryEnglish: Chloe attempts to reunite the afflicted on Attilan with their families back on Earth, while the Avengers try to determine who is spreading the mist.

11.SummaryEnglish: When Medusa is injured during a secret meeting with the Avengers, the Inhumans declare war on Earth.

12.SummaryEnglish: As the Avengers attempt to fend off Maximus's approaching armada, Chloe, Kamala, and Crystal attempt to stop the invasion from within.

13.SummaryEnglish: With Maximus's true ambitions revealed, the Inhumans unite with Earth's heroes in a final battle to protect the planet.
